security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' ipc: http://ipc.localhost https://ipc.localhost

windows.signCommand: powershell -Command "if ($env:AZURE_KEY_VAULT_URI) { AzureSignTool sign -kvu $env:AZURE_KEY_VAULT_URI -kvi $env:AZURE_CLIENT_ID -kvt $env:AZURE_TENANT_ID -kvs $env:AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET -kvc $env:AZURE_CERT_NAME -tr http://timestamp.digicert.com -v '%1' } else { Write-Host 'Skipping signing - no Azure credentials'; exit 0 }"
